availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Barron (Kenton County, Kentucky, pork cutter)

body.p: Kenton County, Kentucky, pork cutter. Married to Jane Smith Barron in Covington on May 17, 1856. Pork cutter in Kenton County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Kenton County, Covington Ward 1 , p. 556.
Covington, Kentucky, First Presbyterian Church Baptisms, Births, Marriages, Deaths 1841-1868, Presbyterian Historical Society; Philadelphia, Pennsylvania; U.S., Presbyterian Church Records, 1701-1907; Accession Number: VAULT BX9211 .K41011 F52 v.1, p. 112 of microfilm.
Find A Grave, "William Barron (1832-1910)," Memorial 10771013, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/10771013 (accessed March 23, 2020).
